titleStmt.title: Iane, by the grace of God quene of England, Fraunce and Ireland, defendor of the faith, & of the Church of Englande, & also of Irelande under Christ in earth the supreme head to al our most louing, faithfull, and obedient subiects, and to euery of them greting
titleStmt.author: Grey, Jane, Lady, 1537-1554.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Grafto[n], reg[inæa] typ[o]graphia [excu]sum,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with loss of text. Bracketed material supplied from STC (2nd ed.).
"Witnesse our selfe at our Towre of London, the tenth day of Julie, in the first yeere of our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
